stretchy="false">!</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{n \choose n} = \frac{n!}{(n-n)!n!} = \frac{n!}{0!n!} = \frac{n!}{1 \cdot n!} = \frac{n!}{n!}
